AreoVeda Hydrating Foam Body Wash

Brand: AreoVeda

Category: Body Wash/Cleanser

Ingredients: Aqua, Coco Glucoside, Cocamidopropyl betaine, Glycerin, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Hydrolyzed Milk Protein, Coffea Arabica Seed Powder, Trehalose, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Powder, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed O

bica (Coffee) Seed Oil, Sodium Gluconate, Saccharide Isomerate, Aqua, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Citric Acid Monohydrate

Directions: Pump an adequate quantity onto your palm, apply the instant foam on the damp face and body. Rinse clean and pat dry.
